name: Untitled Platformer (Kate the Pan Plate)
description:
This is just a test at trying to make a platformer, platforming type game, feel free to ignore.

Controls:

W/up/space = jump

A/left = move left

S/down = "dive" (there's no real use for this)

D/right = move right

left click = shoot grapple (once grapple power-up acquired)

tab = activates debug mode

n = if debug mode is active, skips to next level (can cause error in credits room)

b = if debug mode is active, skips to previous level (can cause error in first room)
